com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.provider.discovery
Class TopologyDiscovererService

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.provider.discovery.TopologyDiscovererService

public class TopologyDiscovererService
extends java.lang.Object

Service that manages queries to all of the TopologyDiscoverers and ensures that results are unique.

          singleton instance of this service

canDiscover

public boolean canDiscover(DiscoveryFilter filter)
Determines whether or not there is at least one discoverer that can handle the query defined by the filter.

Parameters:
filter - the input filter instance that has the filter crtiteria.
Returns:
true, if the one discoverer can fulfill the criteria.

findAll

public java.util.List<UnitDescriptor> findAll(DiscoveryFilter filter)
Returns a list of the unit decriptors based on the discovery criteria from all of the known discoverers.

Parameters:
filter - the input filter instance that has the filter crtiteria.
Returns:
the list of UnitDescriptor based on the matching criteria.

findAll

public java.util.List<UnitDescriptor> findAll(DiscoveryFilter[] filters)
Returns a list of the unit decriptors based on the discovery criteria from all of the known discoverers. The reusults must match all filters provided.

Parameters:
filters - the input filters that has the filter crtiteria.
Returns:
the list of UnitDescriptor based on the matching criteria for all filters.

filterOutDuplicates

Returns:
List of UnitDescriptor

findAllHosts

public java.util.List<UnitDescriptor> findAllHosts(Unit hosted,
                                                   Topology topology,
                                                   IProgressMonitor monitor)
Discovers all hosts of the unit.

Parameters:
hosted - the hosted unit.
topology - the topology which should be queried for hosts (in addition to the topology discoverers).
monitor - the discovery progress and cancellation monitor (may be null).
Returns:
List a list of unit descriptors.

findHost

public Unit findHost(Unit unit,
                     EClass type,
                     Topology topology,
                     IProgressMonitor monitor)
Retrieve a host of a particular type from the hosting stack of a unit.

Parameters:
unit - the hosted unit
type - the type of the hoster in the hosting stack
topology - the search topology
monitor - the discovery progress and cancellation monitor (may be null).
Returns:
the hoster or null if none of the specified type can be found

findTarget

public Unit findTarget(Unit sourceUnit,
                       EClass reqType,
                       EClass targetType,
                       Topology topology,
                       IProgressMonitor monitor)
Find a target unit given a source and the requirement type (but not the requirement). Also validates that the return type is of an expected type.

Parameters:
sourceUnit - the source unit
reqType - the source requirement type
targetType - the target unit type
topology - the search topology
monitor - the discovery progress and cancellation monitor (may be null).
Returns:
target unit

flushDefaultDiscoveryCache

public final void flushDefaultDiscoveryCache()
Clear contents of default discovery cache

isDefaultDiscoveryCachingEnabled

public final boolean isDefaultDiscoveryCachingEnabled()
Returns:
true if default discovery caching is enabled, false otherwise.

enterDefaultDiscoveryCache

public void enterDefaultDiscoveryCache()
Starts discovery result caching if not already enabled.

Caching must be stopped (unlocked) using leaveDefaultDiscoveryCache()

Thread-safe method.

leaveDefaultDiscoveryCache

public void leaveDefaultDiscoveryCache()
Stops discovery result caching once all "enter"s have been matched.

When the last "enter" is matched, the cache is flushed.

Thread-safe method.

See Also:
enterDefaultDiscoveryCache()

isSameUnit

public final boolean isSameUnit(Unit unit1,
                                Unit unit2)
Determine if two units are the same unit.

Parameters:
unit1 - the first unit
unit2 - the second unit
Returns:
true if the units are the same unit
